main.description: I know how to get $#!+ done.

about.bio: My Name is Darian Nocera. I'm a Front-End Web Developer leveraging over 5 years of diverse technical experience. I enjoy wearing many hats and am interested in learning about all things tech. When I'm not coding, you can find me camping, hiking, mountain biking, practicing yoga, writing, reading, tending to my houseplants, or traveling.

timeline.title: The Start
timeline.description: I graduated from Penn State University in 2015 a B.S. in Biomedical Engineering. Wanting to work in health

timeline.title: Professional Experience
timeline.description: I started as a Quality Assurance Specialist at a software company leading in the electronic health record industry. I then transitioned to be a project manager for the software implementations, leading small teams to success. I am currently a consultant that assists with post-live optimization & technical support of the same system.

timeline.title: Web Development
timeline.description: After taking several computer science classes in college, and teaching myself pieces of various languages throughout the years, I decided to get serious about becoming a web developer. In 2020, I graduated a Full Stack Web Development Boot Camp. I am continuing to work on personal projects, solidify concepts, & learn new technologies.

timeline.title: Web Design
timeline.description: I joined The Underdog Foundation as the Vice President & Technical Lead. Through this cause, I have had the pleasure to donate my time to designing websites for small, local businesses impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic. Working with a variety of small businesses has given me invaluable knowledge content writing, UI/UX design, responsive design, SEO, & more.

categories.subtitle: I'm on a mission to master the front-end.
Started on MySpace now I'm here.
I'm like, really good at Googling.

projects.title: HelpersConnect
projects.description: A MERN-stack app that allows charitable organizations to manage events and volunteers.

projects.title: Code Connect
projects.description: A full-stack social platform for developers to connect to meet, collaborate, and learn

projects.title: Developer Portfolio Template
projects.description: A mobile-responsive portfolio template built with Vue.js

projects.title: Date Nite
projects.description: A one-click solution to planning dates utilizing server-side APIs.

projects.title: Read-Da-Book
projects.description: An application to manage a reading list of books on a SQL database rendered with Handlebars.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather application utilizing server-side APIs and persistent data via local storage.

projects.title: The Underdog Foundation
projects.description: Website for The Underdog Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that provides business development services to small, local businesses free of charge.

projects.title: Welton Street Cafe
projects.description: Website for the famous & historic Welton Street Cafe in Five Points, Denver.

projects.title: Genna Rae's Wings & More
projects.description: Website for Genna Rae's Wings, a wing shop in Denver, CO.
